description: Enabling Activities for Implementation of Montreal Protocol in Georgia

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Enabling Georgia to meet its commitment under the Montreal Protocol on phasing out its Chlorofluorocarbons consumption in accordance with the phase-out targets set out in the Protocol and in the national regulation.
subproject.title: Terminal Phase-out Management

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Institutional Strengthening of Georgia Government capacity for implementation of the Montreal Protocol in Georgia enhanced through raising public awareness on ozone-related issues, knowledge sharing, improved reporting and coordination of all ODS phase-out activities.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Institutional Strengthen. ph 5

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Government capacities for implementation of the Hydrochlorofluorocarbons (HCFC) phase-out schedules enhanced through developing investment activities in the refrigeration sector under the Hydrochlorofluorocarbons (HCFC) phase-out management plan.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: HPMP

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Government capacities for implementation of the Hydrochlorofluorocarbons (HCFC) phase-out schedules enhanced through developing investment activities in the refrigeration sector under the Hydrochlorofluorocarbons (HCFC) phase-out management plan.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: HPMP

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Verification of the objectives and goals reached within terminal phase-out management plan for Chlorofluorocarbons in Georgia. Provide a detailed analysis of the data that proves and confirms that the results for reduction of Ozone Depleting Substances consumption were reached. The verification exercise will look into the Ozone Depleting Substances import-export framework with regards to the country’s commitment.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: TPMP Verification

subproject.description: Verification of the objectives and goals reached within terminal phase-out management plan for Chlorofluorocarbons in Georgia. Provide a detailed analysis of the data that proves and confirms that the results for reduction of Ozone Depleting Substances consumption were reached. The verification exercise will look into the Ozone Depleting Substances import-export framework with regards to the country’s commitment.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: TPMP Verification

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Enhancement of Government capacities for implementation of the  Hydrochlorofluorocarbon phase-out schedules enhanced through developing investment activities in the refrigeration sector under the Hydrochlorofluorocarbon phase-out management plan.

subproject.title: Investment Component HPMP
